description:
An OpenSource Managed Wrapper around un4seen Bass and some of its addons.
This project is currently in development.
You can contribute to it on GitHub.

The Library is compiled for AnyCPU.
But the Bass dlls need to be checked for x64 or x86.
Put the Bass dlls in the same folder as ManagedBass.dll.
ManagedBass does not need to be licensed for Commercial use, but bass and many of the addons have to be.
Check the below website for more details
Bass dlls are available at http://www.un4seen.com/bass
Bass and its Addons are trademarks of their respective owners.
releaseNotes:
THERE ARE SOME INCOMPATIBLE CHANGES

+ Completely wrapped BassEnc
+ Plugin class wraps BassAac, BassAc3, BassADX, BassAIX, BassALAC, BassAPE, BassFLAC, BassMPC, BassOFR, BassOPUS, BassSPX, BassTTA, BassWV
+ Added Loopback class
! PlaybackDevice and RecordingDevice have a DeviceInfo property instead of its members
* WasapiDevice has a ReferenceCount private property and is disposed only if ReferenceCount approaches 0.
! DeviceInfo.Flags is read-only
+ Added IAudioCaptureClient implemented by Recording and Loopback
summary: An OpenSource Managed Wrapper around un4seen Bass
title: ManagedBass
